AppUniquifierGenerator

title: Google

AppUniquifierGenerator.generate_app_uniquifier
methods.description: Computes the application uniquifier by examine the file stats of the files in the given application root directory. It only looks at .rb files and Gemfile.lock

params.name: sha
params.description:
A digest SHA object used to add the hashing
values

params.name: app_path
params.description:
Application root directory where the Ruby
application is located.
